event: Early Austroasiatic communities settle the Mekong basin
Funan emerges as an early maritime trade kingdom
Chenla replaces Funan as the dominant inland power
Jayavarman II founds the Khmer Empire
Yasovarman I establishes Angkor as the imperial capital
Angkor Wat constructed under Suryavarman II
Jayavarman VII expands the empire and promotes Mahayana Buddhism
Ayutthaya sacks Angkor, ending imperial dominance
Japanese occupation disrupts French colonial rule
Vietnamese invasion ends Khmer Rouge rule
Constitutional monarchy restored after UN intervention
